name: deploy-repolinter-action
description: code for deploying a repolinter github action

scripts.apply: repo apply --silent --branch "nr1_lib_dep_action" --message "ci: Add NR1 Library Deprecation Checks Workflow" --comment "$(< ./pr-body.md)" "mkdir -p .github/workflows && cp $INIT_CWD/nr1_lib_deprecations.yml .github/workflows/"
scripts.prompt: repo apply --branch "nr1_lib_dep_action" --message "ci: Add NR1 Library Deprecation Checks Workflow" --comment "$(< ./pr-body.md)" "mkdir -p .github/workflows && cp $INIT_CWD/nr1_lib_deprecations.yml .github/workflows/"

author: New Relic Open Source
